intro: Siebera pungens, commonly known as the Chinese evergreen, is a flowering plant native to eastern Asia. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae and is characterized by its upright growth habit and glossy, dark green leaves. The plant produces small, white or pale yellow flowers that are clustered in inflorescences. It is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its attractive foliage and relatively low maintenance requirements. Siebera pungens thrives in moist, well-drained soil and partial to full shade.
